main event: A sighting of a white point of light was reported in Berlin, Germany on 28 March 1948.
interesting points: The incident occurred around 1630 GMT,There was no sound or trail observed from the object,The height of the object was approximately 14 kilometers,The object was moving at a fast speed in a south to north direction,The conclusion points toward the sighting possibly being a meteor.
sighted object: a white point of light in the sky
